tug.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: to pull with one or more short, quick pulls
tug.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: The woman gently tugged his arm.
Joe was tugging at her sleeve.
tug.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: to pull a piece of clothing quickly onto your body
tug.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: Alice was tugging on a sweater.
tug.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: a small strong boat used for pulling or guiding ships into a port, up a river etc
tug.translation[1].definitions[1].exampl: She removed the bandage with a sharp tug.
tug.translation[1].definitions[2].exampl: Kate felt a tug of jealousy.
